1054460.name: Tuition
1054460.description:
This is an incomplete project that was released for "early access" before ceasing development:

Placed in an abandoned university plagued by undead, you need to be creative and resourceful to have a chance of surviving. Your goal is to escape the building, but the hordes of zombies have other plans.

Everything in the environment is intractable and can be used to increase your odds of survival. Starting out with just a knife, pistol, and flashlight, you'll have to find better means of survival to make it through the night.

key Features
  • Zombies surge with increasingly challenging waves
  • Place wooden boards in doorways to barricade zombies
  • Use ladders, chairs, and anything you find to discover new powerful tools for survival
  • Try to escape while you can - a church bell will ring when you can expect another wave of zombies
  • Always keep an eye out - zombies like to trickle in
1054460.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 阿拉伯语, 保加利亚语, 捷克语, 丹麦语, 荷兰语, 芬兰语, 希腊语, 匈牙利语, 日语, 韩语, 挪威语, 波兰语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 罗马尼亚语, 俄语, 简体中文, 西班牙语 - 拉丁美洲, 瑞典语, 泰语, 繁体中文, 土耳其语, 乌克兰语, 越南语
